song.title: Music
song.info:
Lyrics: Music is my passion The only thing I feel It’s really like an obsession and Don’t think I’m not for real
And every time that I sing a song I become a new woman I’m not mad so don’t get me wrong It’s only that I...
Cannot stop until I’m there And I know music helps me when I’m feeling bare I’m walking straight into the light I’m heading for the other side
Sometimes I’m a depressive When everything goes wrong When hassle turns me aggressive then I have to sing a song
At once the troubles just fade away And I become a new woman Sounds pretty easy but it’s that way It’s really that I...
Cannot stop until I’m there And I know music helps me when I’m feeling bare I’m walking straight into the light I’m heading for the other side
So let the music take your heart Good music is a thing apart I’ll sing and dance for my whole life And I enjoy my life I Enjoy my life x2
